block-definition.s: send serialized message $nl %'serialized message' as command to $robot

block.l: var array = serializedMessage.split('').map(function (char) { return char.charCodeAt(0); }); array.unshift(0x0F); this.arduino.board.sysexCommand(array);

block-definition.s: whenever %'serialized message' $nl received as response from $robot %'handler'

block.l: var arduino = this.arduino; arduino.board.onReceivedSerializedMessage = function(serializedMessage) { invoke(updater, new List([serializedMessage])); invoke(handler); }; try { arduino.board.sysexResponse(0x0F, function(data) { var decoded = String.fromCharCode.apply(null, data); arduino.board.onReceivedSerializedMessage(decoded); }); } catch (error) { }
